name: Writing Email Copy
description: Write persuasive emails tailored to your audience to drive desired actions.

nodes.name: llm
nodes.title: Answers
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.human_message: Write an email copy that persuades target audience to take desired action using call to action, based on information {{CTA}} {{offer}} {{product}} {{brand_voice}} {{desired_action}} {{target_audience}} . Ensure the email copy is catchy, creative and engaging.

CTA.title: Call to Action (CTA)
CTA.description: Define the clear action you want recipients to take (e.g., "Buy Now!", "Register Here").

offer.title: Offer/Incentive
offer.description: Mention any incentive you're using to encourage action (e.g., discount code, free trial).

ui_metadata.value: Free downloadable workout guide with personalized exercise routines based on the customer's fitness level and goals.

product.title: Product/Service
product.description: If promoting a specific offering, provide details about it (e.g., key features, benefits).

brand_voice.title: Brand Voice
brand_voice.description: Describe your brand's tone and personality (e.g., professional, friendly, humorous).

ui_metadata.value: Friendly and encouraging, highlighting the brand's commitment to helping customers achieve their fitness goals.

desired_action.title: Desired Action
desired_action.description: Specify the outcome you want your email to achieve (e.g., make a purchase, download a resource, sign up for a webinar).

ui_metadata.value: Download a free workout guide tailored to their fitness goals.

target_audience.title: Target Audience
target_audience.description: Describe the ideal recipient of your email (e.g., existing customers, potential leads, specific demographics).

ui_metadata.value: Existing customers who have previously purchased athletic wear from your brand.  pen_spark
